features: IN THE BOX: Now with 10 more wipes per pack, nine 90-count packs of Unscented baby wipes; 810 baby wipes total
SAME PRODUCT, NEW LOOK: Packaging is transitioning and may vary from pictures; this product is identical in manufacturing and formulation to the previous 720 count
PEDIATRICIAN TESTED: Free from fragrances, alcohol, bronopol, dyes, parabens, and phthalates; use wipes on face, hands, and bottom
WATER-BASED WIPES: Made with naturally derived ingredients and purified water
DO NOT FLUSH: Dispose of used wipes in trash receptacle
ALSO AVAILABLE IN 9 PACK: Sensitive formula and Fresh Scent
Packaging made with at least 25% Post Consumer Recycled Material
body.description: Amazon Elements Unscented wipes are made with pharmaceutical-grade purified water, aloe and vitamin E for clean and gentle wipes. Each one is strong, soft, large, and textured for cleaning hands, face, and diaper area. Your order includes nine flip-top packs for on the go.

productInformation.name: Safety warning
productInformation.value: ‎Keep Out of Reach of Children. Warming: To avoid risk of choking and suffocation, keep wipes and plastic bags away from bbies, children and pets. For external use only.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How are the wipes determined as being safe for my baby? Amazon Elements baby wipes have passed robust clinical testing, supervised by a dermatologist and pediatrician. Is this product different from the discontinued 810-count Amazon Elements Baby Wipes? Yes it is. A manufacturing defect caused accelerated oxidation and discoloration in our now-discontinued 810-count wipes. This defect does not affect our 720-count packages, which have been rigorously tested to meet our quality and safety standards. Can I use these baby wipes to clean other parts of my baby? Yes. Amazon Elements Baby Wipes are safe for cleaning your baby's hands, feet, face, and diaper area. Baby wipes should not be used to clean inside your baby's mouth, nose, ears, or eyes. What ingredients do you keep out of your baby wipes? Amazon Elements Baby Wipes do not contain dyes, parabens, phthalates, or alcohol. Can I rehydrate baby wipes that have dried out? Unfortunately, no. Our baby wipes are manufactured using pharmaceutical-grade purified water to keep them clean and effective; adding tap or bottled water might cause discoloration, odor, or even unwanted growths on the wipes.

Can I still use these if they’ve been left in a hot car? Being left in a hot car can cause wipes to dry out more quickly, especially if the lid isn't properly closed. However, the product will still be safe to use. How long do these baby wipes last? The recommended shelf life of Amazon Elements Baby Wipes is two years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, Safe, and Effective - A Must-Have for Babies
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Amazon Elements Baby Wipes, Fragrance Free, and I am thoroughly impressed. These wipes are incredibly gentle on my baby's sensitive skin, yet effective enough to tackle even the messiest situations. The fact that they are fragrance-free is a huge plus, ensuring no irritation or allergic reactions. They are also very moist, which makes cleaning up easier, and they don't dry out quickly like some other brands. The packaging is convenient, easy to open, and reseals well to keep the wipes fresh. I appreciate the transparency in ingredients and manufacturing process provided by Amazon Elements. Definitely a five-star product and a staple for any parent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great quality and value for the money. I like the texture and they do a great job getting my kids clean. Unlike other wipes, they don’t stick together when you pull them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fragrance-Free Versatility and Exceptional Durability
reviews.reviewText: We've been using Amazon's Unscented Wipes for over seven years, and they've been consistently excellent. They're not just for babies – they've been amazing for all messes. We initially bought them when we had our child seven years ago and never stopped our subscription. We take them on picnics, park play dates, or road trips. The material is durable and doesn't rip apart like other brands. There has never been a surprise cleaning up a mess where our hands touched something we didn't want.The packaging could have some improvements in that occasionally, the plastic part where the wipes come out sometimes comes off. Most times, we can stick it back on, but there are the occasional moments when the glue to keep it there gives up, and it winds up drying out. Even if they dry out, though, they are still excellent for cleaning up wet spills like juice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only wipes we buy
reviews.reviewText: With my first child, we started off using Waterwipes and it got $$$ really fast. We then tried other brands but I never fell in love with any. The texture would always be too rough - like sandpaper or the wipe would be too large or too small. I heard about the Amazon Elements wipes from another mom friend and tried it. WOW it really is the best. It's soft texture (not as soft as waterwipes, but similar) and perfect sheet size won me over and the price is amazing! One wipe container can last us a whole month (this is with a newborn). There are a lot of wipes in there and they always stay wet as long as you keep the top closed. I have these wipes on subscription because we love them so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but Annoying Sound!
reviews.reviewText: I am so conflicted about these wipes. The wipes themselves are great. They aren't too thick or thin, they aren't too wet, and therefore don't rip quickly like some other brands. They are great and affordable.The issue, the plastic packaging. This thing is so LOUD lol. You pick it up and try to pull one out, and it's just so annoying. Might just be a pet peeve of mine but it seems like the plastic is just such bad quality or something. Also, not sure if it's related, but sometimes the wipes get stuck and you end up pulling out more than one at a time.If for example, you are using these to refill a container. PERFECT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: Very basic product, but its good to know that the Amazon brand is quality. No scent, easy on my young children and their sensitive skin, and arrives on time. I keep this in my car, in travel bags, in the children's activity bags, and in every bathroom in the home so its nice to have a more affordable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars highly recommend these wipes to any parent looking for a reliable and gentle option
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Elements Baby Wipes in the fragrance-free option, in a bulk pack of 810 wipes. As a parent, I am always looking for convenient and high-quality products that are gentle on my baby's skin, so I decided to give these wipes a try.One of the standout features of this product is the sheer quantity of wipes included in the pack. With 810 wipes, I don't have to worry about running out anytime soon. This is particularly helpful during those moments when my baby needs frequent diaper changes or when I need to clean up spills and messes. The bulk packaging also ensures that the wipes remain fresh and ready for use.In terms of quality, these wipes have exceeded my expectations. They are incredibly soft and gentle, making them perfect for my baby's sensitive skin. I appreciate that they are fragrance-free, as it reduces the risk of any skin irritation or allergies. Despite being gentle, the wipes are still effective at thoroughly cleaning and removing dirt, making diaper changes quick and easy.Overall, I am highly satisfied with the Amazon Elements Baby Wipes in the fragrance-free option. The 810-count bulk pack ensures that I have an ample supply of wipes on hand, while the sensitive and high-quality formula provides peace of mind for my baby's delicate skin. I would highly recommend these wipes to any parent looking for a reliable and gentle option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large. Really great
reviews.reviewText: These are a little hit larger than regular size wipes . They wipe just as great. A cheaper option than some of the other ones out there .
Good product. Sheets are thick enough. They were on sale so a good value.

These are a great size .. thicker then l was expecting .. no scent at all .. great for the car or truck , while travelling .. strong enough to clean your hands up .. bought the case for the holidays as all my very young grandchildren are coming 😁, fits in diaper wipe warmer well .

Value for money, don't fall apart, not too wet or too dry. They are a smaller than the brand names ( which is why the 4 stars), so if you use these a lot, you'd have to figure out if they were cost effective compared to name brands.I use them to remove makeup and they're great for wiping my dog's paws after being outside in dirt/mud.They're also truly unscented. Not like some that have a mild but chemical like scent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, awesome value. So soft. Will buy again.
reviews.reviewText: My new favourite baby wipes. These are soooo soft and perfect for my sensitive skin baby. I got the unscented version and they’re wonderful, no scent at all. I even left a pack in my hot car all week and no gross smell afterwards. These felt a lot dryer to the touch than other brand wipes that feel soaking wet, but I think it’s just the material used because they clean just as good. I thought they were defective and all dried out but I gave them a shot anyway. They’re perfect! This is a nice for feature since babies often don’t like a cold wet wipe on their bum. We will be buying again.
Will definitely purchase again. No smell and comes out easily.
